title: I get no incoming calls on my brand new Pixel 5. All go straight to voicemail.
content:
Incoming calls are going straight to voicemail, and do not show up in my call history.
I have checked the network settings, restarted phone, cleared the app cache, and made sure do not disturb was not on. Monkeyed with all of the phone settings (turn on/off spam and call screening etc.) The SIM card is new, I have tried changing the network setting from Global to LTE/CDMA. 
I also checked for updates.
Nothing works.  I have never had coverage or call issues with any of my previous phones.  Outgoing calls work fine.
